StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertOrUpdateCollegePro.leLoca.ons]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@CollegePro.leID uniqueiden..er, @SchoolCode int, @FiscalYear int, @LocDisplayTablePrimary varchar(100), @LocDisplayTableSecondary varchar(100), @LocTes.ngRoom varchar(100), @LocInterviewRoom varchar(100), @LocTakeOne varchar(100), @CampusWebSites varchar(2000), @PosteringRestric.ons varchar(2000), @UserLogin varchar(50)
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
IF EXISTS (SELECT '1' FROM [USMC].CollegePro.le where CollegePro.leID = @CollegePro.leID and @CollegePro.leID IS NOT NULL) --SCHOOL_CODE = @SchoolCode --and FiscalYear = @FiscalYear
-- then update the exisi.ng record BEGIN UPDATE [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegePro.le] SET -- not allowed to update the school_code [LocDisplayTablePrimary] = @LocDisplayTablePrimary, [LocDisplayTableSecondary] = @LocDisplayTableSecondary, [LocTes.ngRoom] = @LocTes.ngRoom, [LocInterviewRoom] = @LocInterviewRoom, [LocTakeOne] = @LocTakeOne, [CampusWebSites] = @CampusWebSites, [PosteringRestric.ons] = @PosteringRestric.ons, [UserLogin] = @UserLogin, [UpdateDate] = GetDate()
WHERE CollegePro.leID = @CollegePro.leID --SCHOOL_CODE = @SchoolCode
END
--- ELSE PROCEED WITH INSERT ELSE BEGIN
INSERT INTO [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegePro.le] ([CollegePro.leID],[SCHOOL_CODE], [FiscalYear],[LocDisplayTablePrimary], [LocDisplayTableSecondary],[LocTes.ngRoom],[LocInterviewRoom], [LocTakeOne] ,[CampusWebSites],[PosteringRestric.ons], [UserLogin] ,[UpdateDate]) VALUES (@CollegePro.leID,@SchoolCode,@FiscalYear,@LocDisplayTablePrimary, @LocDisplayTableSecondary, @LocTes.ngRoom, @LocInterviewRoom, @LocTakeOne, @CampusWebSites, @PosteringRestric.ons, @UserLogin, GetDate()) END --- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
